Description:
Detects Non-Standard tools initiating a connection over port 3389 indicating possible lateral movement.
An initial baseline is required before using this utility to exclude third party RDP tooling that you might use.


Author: Markus Neis
Sigma Repository: [GitHub](https://github.com/SigmaHQ/sigma)
Name: Outbound RDP Connections Over Non-Standard Tools
Query: sourcetype='windows-sysmon' eql select * from _source_ where ((dst_port = '3389' and initiated = 'true') and  not (process_path = 'c:\windows\system32\mstsc.exe' or process_path = 'c:\windows\syswow64\mstsc.exe') and  not (process_path like '%\rdcman.exe' or process_path = 'c:\program files\google\chrome\application\chrome.exe' or (process_path like '%\thor.exe' or process_path like '%\thor64.exe') or (process_path = 'c:\windows\system32\dns.exe' and src_port = '53' and protocol = 'udp') or process_path = 'c:\program files\mozilla firefox\firefox.exe' or process_path = '' or process_path = '<unknown process>' or (process_path like '%\avast software\avast\avastsvc.exe' or process_path like '%\avast\avastsvc.exe') or process_path like 'c:\program files\splunkuniversalforwarder\bin\%' or process_path like '%\ranger\sentinelranger.exe' or (process_path = 'c:\program files\tsplus\java\bin\html5service.exe' or process_path = 'c:\program files (x86)\tsplus\java\bin\html5service.exe') or (process_path like '%\fsassessment.exe' or process_path like '%\fsdiscovery.exe' or process_path like '%\mobarte.exe' or process_path like '%\mremote.exe' or process_path like '%\mremoteng.exe' or process_path like '%\passwordstate.exe' or process_path like '%\remotedesktopmanager.exe' or process_path like '%\remotedesktopmanager64.exe' or process_path like '%\remotedesktopmanagerfree.exe' or process_path like '%\rssensor.exe' or process_path like '%\rts2app.exe' or process_path like '%\rtsapp.exe' or process_path like '%\spiceworks-finder.exe' or process_path like '%\terminals.exe' or process_path like '%\ws_tunnelservice.exe') or process_path = 'null'))
